title: DAW-Based Sound Design Education: Creative Music Production Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: The program focuses on enhancing the competencies of pre-service and in-service teachers to design and operate creative music expression activities within the language curriculum, utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops) and educational DAW software (Reaper, GarageBand, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can edit and synthesize audio tracks using a DAW interface and produce a 3-minute sound design piece.
Learners can explain a creative process that reinterprets sound as musical units through experimental approaches.
A sound-based educational activity design plan (equivalent to one unit) linked to the language curriculum can be developed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
